title: Summarize Document
description: Summarize long documents, extract key points, and create structured outlines from any text content
author: Jarvis Inc

commands.name: summarize
commands.description: Create a concise summary of a document or text

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The document text to summarize (or URL to fetch)

returns.description: Summary object with condensed text, word count, compression ratio, and key topics covered

commands.name: extract_key_points
commands.description: Extract the most important points from a document

parameters.name: max_points
parameters.description: Maximum number of key points to extract

returns.description: Array of key point objects with statement, importance rating, source section, and supporting quote

commands.name: create_outline
commands.description: Generate a structured hierarchical outline from document content

returns.description: Hierarchical outline with nested sections, each containing heading, summary, and sub-sections
